description: This request for service proposes to repair and restore DND M85 snow blower for the required operations. The project consist of inspection, repair, testing, and technical investigation. It will be executed for a period of three (3) years.
duration_in_months: Well equipped and experienced service personnel should complete the work
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Bidding Opportunity

Running of Snow Blowers: Repair and Overhaul Services

### Notice of Proposed Procurement

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is hereby issued to solicit bids for the repair and overhaul of snow blowers for the Department of National Defence. The work includes inspection, testing, repairs, and training for a three-year period, with an optional two-year extension.

### Tender Details

- **Tender No.**: W8486-249244/B
- **Publication Date**: May 23, 2024
- **Closing Date and Time**: July 4, 2024, 2:00 pm EST

### Goods/Services Requirement

A three-year contract for the repair and overhaul of snow blowers is required, with an option to extend the contract for two additional years. The contractor shall provide the necessary equipment and personnel to perform the work.

### Requirements and Specifications

- **Specifications**: [Refer to annex I, Technical Specifications and Attachments]
- **Work Location**: Alberta and Quebec (except National Capital Region)
- **Delivery Scheduling**: Work shall be conducted on an "as-and-when required" basis, as detailed in a Task Authorization Form (DND 626 form).
- **Language of Submission**: Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Evaluation Criteria

- **Lowest Price**: The bid with the lowest price shall be the basis of evaluation.

### Special Conditions

- **Confidentiality**: The contractor shall ensure the confidentiality of the work performed.
- **Debriefing**: Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid process.

### Bid Submission

- **Electronic Receipt**: Bids must be submitted via email only to [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca)
